sourcesContent:
import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; import { PokemonDetail } from '../service/models/pokemon.detail'; @Component({ selector: 'app-pokemon-card', templateUrl: './pokemon-card.component.html', styleUrls: ['./pokemon-card.component.sass'] }) export class PokemonCardComponent { @Input() pokemon!: PokemonDetail; corDeFundoMapping: any = { "grass": "#3CB371", "fire": "#F4A460", "psychic": "#9370DB", "water": "#00BFFF", "bug": "#df8830", "normal": "#B0C4DE", "fighting": "#B22222", "rock": "#4F4F4F", "electric": "#FFD700", "ice": "#B0E0E6", "dark": "#1C1C1C", "ghost": "#191970", "poison": "#4B0082", "steel":"#808080", "dragon":"#FF6347", "ground":"#8B0000" }; show: boolean = false ; showModal(){ this.show = !this.show } getID(id: number): string{ return ("000" + id).slice(-3) } }

#{{getID(pokemon.id)}}

{{pokemon.types[0].type.name}}

{{pokemon.name}}

{{getID(pokemon.id)}}

{{pokemon.types[0].type.name}}

{{pokemon.types[1].type.name}}

DESCRIPTION

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Architecto facere eveniet fuga similique porro saepe ratione libero, quidem, quos blanditiis mollitia asperiores, et dicta optio distinctio recusandae praesentium cumque quo?

CARACTERISTIQUES

STATS
